availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Virginia native. Married to Hannah J. Hudson Gordon on September 10, 1858. Father of Mary E. Gordon. Resident of Mason County, Kentucky, in 1858.

ab.bibl: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 2, p. 7. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), Mason County, Marriages, 1858, Microfilm rolls #994027-994058, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky. Find A Grave, "Robert D Gordon (1840-1901)," Memorial #8510432, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/8510432/robert-d-gordon (accessed June 14, 2017). KYR-0001-029-0583.
